context:
List of shopping malls in India
Name | Location | Year | Size ( gross leasable area )
--- | --- | --- | ---
LuLu International Shopping Mall | Edapally , Kochi | 2013 | 2,500,000 sq ft ( 230,000 m )
Hilite Mall | Palazhi , Kozhikode | 2014 | 1,400,000 sq ft ( 130,000 m ) ( total built area )
Mall of Travancore | Chakka , Thiruvananthapuram | 2018 | 700,000 sq ft ( 65,000 m ) ( total built area )
Centre Square Mall | MG Road , Kochi | 2014 | 630,000 sq ft ( 59,000 m ) ( total built area )
Sobha City Mall | Puzhakkal , Thrissur | 2015 | 600,000 sq ft ( 56,000 m )
Gold Souk Grande | Vytilla , Kochi | 2011 | 500,000 sq ft ( 46,000 m )
RP Mall | Mavoor Road , Kozhikode | 2012 | 
Oberon Mall | Edapally , Kochi | 2008 | 350,000 sq ft ( 33,000 m ) ( total built area )
Y Mall | Triprayar , Kochi | 2018 | 205,000 sq ft ( 100,000 m )
Mall of Joy | Municipal Office Road , Thrissur | 2014 | 200,000 sq ft ( 19,000 m )
Abad Nucleus Mall | Maradu , Kochi | 2010 | 120,000 sq ft ( 11,000 m )
RP Mall | Chinnakada , Kollam | 2012 | 100,000 sq ft ( 9,300 m )
H & J Mall | Karunagapally , Kollam | 2014 | 120,000 sq ft ( 11,000 m )

wiki_section_title: Kerala

wiki_section_text: 

intro: This is a list of shopping malls in India, sortable by name, location, year opened and size.
